store.title: Summary store details
store.description: Return the summary details about a CE Store

_id.description: The unique identifier (name) for this store

_created.description: The (unix timestamp) date value on which this store was created

sentence_count.description: The total number of sentences defined in this store

model_count.description: The total number of conceptual models defined in this store

concept_count.description: The total number of concepts defined in this store

instance_count.description: The total number of instances defined in this store

server_time.description: The current (unix timestamp) date value on the server on which this store is located

store_version.description: The version string for this store.
